Do you want there to be a God? If you suddenly found out that God existed, would you be relieved? Upset? Frightened? Overjoyed? Indifferent?
It would depend on the god. I don't like too many of the current ones people believe in.
I really wouldn't care. If there's a god, alright all our metaphysical questions are solved. I would still live my life as I see fit.

A loving merciful God that judges on actions...
 
 I would be releived and overjoyed!
 
 Always Stay Open Minded

Ya know, I might not like the actions this newly found God may bring with him, but I would like to at least know he exists. Perhaps we could learn a great deal by studying him. Also if he was the Christian God, then we would be able to make logical decisions about how to live our lives the way we should in order to get to heaven. I see no major disadvantage to simply learning that a certain God existed.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Another question for atheists/agnostics
